duties_responsibilities.duty: Design heating systems, including hydronic and steam piping, boilers, pumps, controls, etc.
HVAC System Controls – Development/design of control sequences of operation, schematic control drawings, and understanding of building automation controls
Plumbing Systems - Sanitary piping, domestic hot and cold water piping, hot water generation, piping insulation, pump systems, fuel and gas systems, laboratory piping, etc.

education_certification.credential: Bachelors Degree in Mechanical Engineering from an ABET-accredited program. Professional Engineering License (or the ability to acquire it within 9 months)
